title: #6【FF9】完全初見でファイナルファンタジーⅨを始める！ FINAL FANTASY Ⅸ ぺこ！【ホロライブ/兎田ぺこら】※ネタバレ注意
name: Usada Pekora

entries.text: Slept in till the last minute though.
So I'm having yogurt for breakfast now.
like some beast out of a book.
that really good scene with Steiner and Beatrix...
only for them to die once...
What on earth is going on?
I thought, "The mastermind is here, so cool!"
But then this handsome old guy appeared.
Once I eat this yogurt, I'll start right away.
Valentine's Day isn't universal after all.
"It's just a normal day," you say?
Since it's the weekend in Japan...
do you get them at the start of the week?
Wait, did you get some already?
The receiving side has to return the favor too.
Gonna put in my mouthpiece and start.
Maybe the confectionery industry was being loud.
Valentine's is probably their "sell, sell, sell" season.
"You're not returning the favor after getting Valentine's?"
I wonder what's going to happen today.
Do the library guys have signs?
I want something new and good though.
Then I guess I can go.
Was there really no treasure here?
Should I just go up the stairs?
If you click that purple part...
you can go down through the fireplace.
Secret passages are such a dream.
Only rich people can do that, peko.
"Hmph. Surprising that Alexandria Castle had a mechanism like this-buri."
"So Dagger and Eiko are up there?"
"Right now, my head is full of..."
"We should stick together, surely? Isn't one person powerless?"
"Besides, that Eye has been glaring at us."
"Dagger is all I can think about."
"I don't have the confidence to protect everyone right now."
"Well, you're not the type to die in a place like this."
"But protecting one human is not easy, Petan."
"Come, Vivi. Leave the rest to Petan."
Eh, is it okay to leave it to him?
"Come on, let's leave it to him-buri."
Is that okay? Guess they trust him that much.
"Does one need a reason to live?"
"You don't need such a thing, right?"
If he doesn't save them now, it's bad, Petan, seriously.
"Did Peko and the others do something terrible?"
No, more importantly, that looked like an attack.
"I-I have a lot to say, but it's dangerous here."
That eye thing can do more than brainwash?
Ah, it's doing some crest thing.
"Has returned to the stars," he says.
Feels like it resembles that big thing.
"Before our plan spanning thousands of years..."
Ah, these guys live for thousands of years.
"The river flows fast, so it is fine."
Impossible, no matter how fast you run.
Maybe Vivi was working hard for that?
"However, the time has not yet come."
"We cannot return the flow of souls yet."
"I needed you to work a little longer, but..."
"To live clinging to Gaia within a limited time?"
"That too must have been your fate."
"Just as I must meet the one who will replace you again."
"Reconstruction of the castle town is proceeding smoothly as you can see."
"Workers and volunteers are flooding in for the construction of the Hilda Garde 3."
"The people of Lindblum are truly reliable-buri."
"We are proud to be citizens of this country."
Did he have no choice but to show it to raise the white flag?
"As long as there is something to believe in at the bottom of our hearts..."
"no matter how destroyed the city is, we will not lose."
Even though his wife ran away from home?
"Calling it the worst would be better."
"It'd be faster to finish the No. 3 than to repair it-buri."
With that blast, it's impossible, right?
"I think he should be waking up soon, but..."
"tell him to come to my room."
My memory... not memory, did I faint?
Ah, but judging by earlier, he only has Dagger on his mind.
Hey, wait, Blank, shouldn't you tell him the message?
He's still only thinking about the girl.
This is bad. Might be dead.
"I used to be a man of the sea."
Pekora has to look after Quina now.
Can go to the factory here.
I have to do food education for that kid.
I'm gonna fall in love with Quina.
My head is full of Quina.
"This time I was in a bit of trouble too."
"Sorry, I was being stubborn back then."
"Eh? Why won't you talk to me?"
Ah, seeing me after so long...
No, really, if you stay silent...
Gonna cheer her up a bit.
Eh, you don't want that either?
"W-Well, everyone has times they want to be alone."
"You ran away and missed your chance to speak."
"When it comes to the woman you fell for, you lose sight of everything else."
Go to the Regent for now.
"Thanks Blank, for going out of your way."
Going to the Regent's Chamber for now.
"We learned various things from the incident in Alexandria-buri."
"Ah, the others are already gathered in the conference room below."
"Am I late? I was chasing a woman..."
Wait, the Princess that Steiner and Pekora protected isn't here.
Usually you get caught in the explosion.
But Bahamut was going boom boom boom...
so to deal with that, Alexander was unavoidable I think.
Even if it was Kuja's plan...
If it hadn't appeared, Bahamut would have burned everything.
So, Pekora definitely thinks it's not Dagger's fault.
"In the first place, leaving Mother and running away from home was bad."
No, but if you say that...
If we start from running away...
then the start of FF9 is a sin?
You can't stop that greedy Brahne's greed.
"No, because I ran away, Mother became like that."
"To atone for the mistakes Mother made..."
"I intended to take the throne, but..."
She's depressed. This is bad, wait.
No, that's wrong. Someone needs to be there for her.
In times like this, a man has to say...
You have to say that, Petan.
"Beatrix and I fought monsters for the people, but..."
"I prepared for death in that chaos-dears."
Died once already. Maybe die twice.
"it took considerable time for the citizens plunged into despair to rise for reconstruction."
"Survivors need extraordinary vitality to have hope to live."
"The one I can't forgive is that bastard Kuja."
Right, these people don't know about Garland yet.
"How do you intend to stand against that immense power?"
"I saw an unbelievable sight in Alexandria-buri."
"And Black Mage soldiers were on the Hilda Garde 1-buri."
"And not just ordinary Black Mage soldiers-buri."
Like the old guys from the Black Mage Village?
"I saw it clearly with these eyes-buri."
"Me dying... there's no way that could happen."
Is this guy actually afraid of death?
"Do you think I'd give a role to a senile old survivor like you now?"
"I just have to obtain something to replace it."
"You really are one that can speak."
"Is the preparation for that plan ready?"
"I still need them to work for me."
"I will rest my body for a while, but don't slack off."
I might need to go to the Black Mage Village.
"He must have stolen the airship along with Hilda-buri."
"I want you to take back the airship and Hilda from whoever did it-buri."
"For a King of a nation... what a pathetic story."
"Exactly-dears. We must do something about that man."
"He has an airship. We don't know where he went, so chasing him is difficult, isn't it?"
"In this body, it is difficult to even order the construction of a new airship-buri."
"I want to return to human form somehow-buri."
"But only Hilda knows how to restore me-buri."
Say 'I will never cheat again'. Just say "Please change me back".
"We have summoned Doctor Tot. He should arrive shortly."
"Surely Tot-dono will lend us his wisdom."
"This is Doctor Tot-dono. Thank you for coming despite your busy schedule."
"No no, do not worry. I have heard rumors of this incident."
"Even so, everyone... glad you are safe."
"I do not see the Princess or Eiko-dono. Could it be..."
"Don't worry, Sensei. Eiko is looking for Dagger right now."
"Needless worry then. By the way, Tot-dono... straight to business."
Wait, so it wasn't a bad mood?
"We will send a messenger later. And Petan... come tell me how the Princess is later-buri?"
"Please wait. This is hard on an old man."
"Indeed, the Princess has lost her words."
"Likely because too many tragic events happened in succession."
"The cause is a deep wound to her heart."
"Oi, will Dagger stay like this forever?"
"But I cannot say when she will be able to speak."
"If her heart's wound heals, she will regain her words, but..."
"that will be the Princess's own battle."
"But at that time, unless the Princess herself possesses the positive mind to speak..."
Ugh, the current Dagger is impossible then.
She keeps saying "my fault". She has to realize it's not her fault?
"Anyway, for now, we can only try to soothe the Princess's heart in the depths of sorrow."
"My lack of power caused the Princess such pain..."
"Sorry, but look after Dagger for a while."
"Don't let him do as he pleases anymore."
Eh wait. Eh. Wait a minute, let me think.
Losing the healer is annoying. Both summoners.
Wait wait wait. Eeeeeh. Eiko... Can't we at least ask her?
"To stop Kuja, we need an airship ASAP."
Petan thinks if he beats Kuja, maybe the stress will go away?
"Tell us how to turn Old Man Cid back."
Eh? "Old Man Cid?" To build the airship?
"Now, now, please calm down. Let us go to the Regent first."
Sorry, but Old Man is leaving too.
Asking for the Old Man too.
"Is there a way to restore me-buri?"
"If transformed by magic, usually only the caster can reverse it, but..."
"However, I remember reading in a very old book..."
"a method to restore a human transformed by a curse."
"it was a book written for amusement, so I don't know if it's trustworthy."
"No no. Just mixing three medicines and applying directly."
"Even if it fails, nothing should happen."
"Then we need to try it at least once-buri."
"If the Old Man doesn't die, anything goes."
"Saying whatever you want just because it's someone else's problem-buri."
"Unusual Potion, Beautiful Potion, and Suspicious Potion."
"Those were often used by conjurers long ago."
"Since they are rarely used now, I wonder if we can get them."
"I feel like Cinna had the Unusual Potion."
"I'll go to the city and find them."
Are they really in the city?
You're holding it in your right hand!
"It is-zura. My hammer absolutely can't be lent."
"Okay. Anything that can hit a nail is fine."
Is there a treasure sleeping in My Hammer?
Wait, isn't there a former card champion?
You... The guy who lost to me.
"Ah, I hope the ship comes soon."
Thought it was the guy who lost to me.
Jealous of liking someone in the art gallery.
"Oh, isn't it the couple from back then?"
"Then you know, right? What you do for someone who saved you?"
"After that, Ray and I ran here."
"Some other friends are in Lindblum too."
"Yes, somehow survived and came to friendly Lindblum."
"But starting with Dan... many lives were sacrificed."
"But if we live, there is hope."
"By the way, what will you do, Freya-san?"
"I intend to chase that man Kuja with Petan and the others."
"We will reorganize and work on rebuilding our motherland Burmecia."
"We wanted you to lend us your strength, Freya-san, but..."
Eh, isn't she going to go with them?
"I intend to return to Burmecia once I fulfill my goal."
"Sorry, but do your best until then."
"Understood. We will do everything we can."
"We'll work hard with the survivors so you can return anytime."
"If only Fratley-sama were here at a time like this."
"Ah right, I have something I want you to see."
"Here? Didn't think I could show you, brother."
Wait, giving birth to that many?
Burmecia really looks like it can be rebuilt.
"We intend to return to Burmecia eventually too."
"by the time these little ones grow up."
"I hope those children become the new Burmecia."
"If you have any trouble, anything we can do..."
"I'm the one who saved your parents."
"When I visit rebuilt Burmecia, give me a free inn stay."
They'll probably say "Who is this old man?" when they grow up.
Can't put it on Petan anyway.
But I have Hermes Shoes on right now.
"If it's in this studio, you can take it."
Let's go to the Tantalus place.
"Met Blank and No. 2 too. Inside the castle."
"Hey, what's up? Doesn't look like a casual visit."
"Actually, I have a request. Do you have the Unusual Potion?"
"I'll think about it when things settle down."
"To turn Old Man Cid back into a human."
"I can't hold anything but the potion-zura."
"It's hard to repair when it's this broken."
How do I get to the sleeping guy?
"Never used such a potion. Sorry not to be helpful."
Got two now. Let's go to the Business District.
The potion to restore Regent Cid?
Wait, wasn't there a guy like you?
"Now that the Business District is gone, new technology is awaited."
"I heard there was a potion maniac in the Theater District studio."
"I'm a potion expert, so please ask someone else."
"But is there a use for it now?"
Ah, maybe I can go to the studio.
That guy earlier... Wait, he's the potion maniac?
"Scary guy. Was a potion maniac actually?"
"I don't use that in my pickles! Useless talk."
All gathered? Hurry back to Cid.
Pearl Rouge. Wait, how many Moonstones do I have?
"Because there's only 4, it's rare!" I was told.
"Rumor says an airship needing no mist power is being built."
"Even if mist stops, I won't die."
"Rumors come out because there's a basis."
No smoke without fire. That's it.
Looking forward to cool old man.
Will he be different from Buri-chu?
If he doesn't change, I'll cry.
Cool old man, please. Magnificent beard.
"Kept you waiting. The 3 potions are in this beaker in the right ratio."
Eh wait, lie? Eh, frog? Eh?
Eh, can't see his form? Insect to frog?
"We must find Hilda at all costs."
If we do this a few times, will real Cid appear?
"Everyone is gathered. Now, a word from the Regent."
"Now a frog form. Tried to return to human, but failed-kero."
"Order Olbert and Zebolt to prep it-kero."
"You said normal Black Mages were on the airship, right?"
"If we go to Black Mage Village, we might learn something."
"Hmm, I see. I want to see with my own eyes."
"If everyone is helping Kuja... I want to know the truth."
"To get a lead, Black Mage Village seems good. For Vivi too."
"Vivi-dono's spirit is wonderful. By the way... what about the Princess?"
Even if she comes... She can't speak.
What to do? Does she want to come?
Is she okay? Don't force it.
Eiko is together, so it's fine.
"Gather at the lowest harbor when ready-kero."
"Eating everything in the world is my mission-aru."
Go mid-layer. Guest room. No characters.
Where is this? Ship is later.
Can make ship up to here. Beyond that, need Regent.
New airship work is progressing, but...
Thought it was a monster at first, but just a frog.
Toad spell might cure him? From frog to...
"Your acquaintance tried to dine and dash."
"Sorry about my kid." "Take him and go."
"Let's go Quina." "Don't need to follow that close."
Dark Hat. Magic down. This one.
Equip him. Quina will go somewhere anyway.
Quina, everyone might want that. Too sweet to Quina?
Wants to be scolded. Wants to do what he likes but be scolded.
If Pekora doesn't look after him, who will?
5000 is scarce. Falling for bad men.
No, Quina isn't a bad man.
A child, really. I'll look after him.
If an adult did this... Pekora would be done.
Too many abilities. Bag is fine. Let's go to Mage Village.
Hot today. Room is super hot.
Is it warm today? Or just me?
Can't open due to father's orders.
Did Quina say bye? To Blue Narciss.
"It's orders from Boss, but the one who asked Boss... was me-kero."
"Quina, I know. Not just money this time." "It's me-kero."
"When you leave the ship... I can't just leave it-kero."
Eh, okay? Quina is in back.
"Don't get too excited. Still a frog."
"Oh right. To change the 4 fighters, talk to me inside-kero."
Need a healer. Dagger or Eiko. Want Eiko.
"Even so, fight! You came on our journey."
Chocobo is good. Can I go?
Left. Sea. This ship is nice.
Wanted to feed you. Quina, seriously. Huh?
Quina too far. Sorry Moguo. Sorry.
"Small island beach is a resort spot-kupo."
Still a bird. Many Chocographs. Vertical first.
Don't know location. Easier to find. Fast finding.
Bonus time next. Cat? Getting 3 or 4. Level 9.
40 seconds left. Not down. Similar place. Want something?
One last hit. 1 second is enough.
Card, Wing Edge, Anklet, Lord of Lords.
Too far! Everything is too far!
Can't go yet? Orange dot? Not later, 9 total?
Around here? River visible? Looks like this.
Oi Chocograph. Different one next. All beak.
Chocobo-chan... Sad? Want to buy Chocograph.
Can change outside? Bumpy part is key.
Not far from ship. River is here. Dirty place?
No river here. Can't go there.
Go by ship from afar? Chocograph.
Freezing land. Get off. Go around.
Inland. Gysahl Greens bring Chocobo anywhere.
Something there. Endure? Can't land without tracks.
Hope enemies aren't strong. First time here.
Eh really? Zaghnol-chan? I remember the soil land.
Here? This side. Not death. Too far right.
Brown place. Up here is brown.
Can't equip. Ability Up person. Here.
Theater Ship card. Unexplored Land. Difficult.
Getting it, but hard. Castle over there? Mage Village.
Brainwashed by Chocograph. Body moving on its own.
Marsh means feed Quina? Still here. Feeding time.
Can't feed Cid. Better to feed here than eat Cid.
If he eats Regent Cid... Pekora can't do anything.
20... Won't come back here. Eat all.
Quina doing his best. Silver. Eat all.
Eat as you like. Confirm. Wide.
Frog again. Let's go. Silver Fork. Why wasn't he using it?
River flowing... air is bad. Why so bad?
River flows... go inside? Just go quietly.
Mage Village close. Detour over. Go to village.
And Pekora found the Qu's Marsh again.
Eat frogs. "Catch." Tadpole. One adult? Two.
Eating kids is cruel. Can't take future lives.
But eat Mom and Dad. Parent-killer Quina. "Be careful."
Frogs say "If Quina comes, you die." Where are we?
Goblin Punch cute. Accuracy. Not equipped. No choice.
Everyone in back row. Why? Ah, Dantarian. Because attacks hurt.
I'll punch you, brat. Breakfast was yogurt. With honey.
High encounter rate. Even a brat gets a lesson punch.
Hand coming out of screen would be trouble.
Glad we haven't progressed that far. World should be grateful.
What will the future be? Tech is amazing. Nice.
Game food smell. Potion smell. "Poon." Funny.
Forest smell in games would be huge.
Bag. No reaction? Horror game zombie smell would be gross.
Hard to do. Environment needed. Hard to play casually.
Locked. Everyone gone. Gone to Kuja? Feels like it.
Black Mage No. 234 made. The ones here. Threatened by Kuja?
Bed. Ladder. Gone. Gone to Kuja.
"Only me and the two in the chocobo stable remain."
"Everyone found out. That our time is limited."
Extension? "I'll extend your life" is a lie.
Can Kuja do it? "But to believe him... Forgot what he did?"
"Maybe that's what we are. Made to listen to humans."
"Hey, don't go that far." "Where?" "Can't say. Betrayal."
"Then why are you here?" Silent. Weird pause.
Said stable too. "Hey Vivi." Why not extend life?
Or knows it won't work? Possibility exists.
Chase Vivi. "Extend life... follow me." might work on me.
Vivi. Taking a bath? "Are you okay?"
"We stayed to care for Chocobo eggs."
"We wanted to go, but everyone said protect the eggs." Eh?
"You guys can't extend life, so protect the eggs"?
"We warmed them. Show everyone soon. Need names."
Wait, okay? Sounds like he's dying.
Born? Tears of joy? Worried about eggs?
"I don't know. I was scared and wanted to run to Kuja..."
"but felt there was something more important."
"Prototypes made before me move a bit longer, Kuja said. But eventually stop."
"When Grandpa died, I didn't understand. Told not to be sad."
"So I thought I shouldn't be. Hearing friends stop just felt weird inside."
"Didn't know what to do. But seeing Dagger-oneechan's face when her mom died..."
"Because I'm not a killing tool, right? Confusing, but I understood that."
"If we aren't tricked by him... everyone will understand. We aren't killing tools."
"Kuja's hideout is east. He told me."
"Cross to the east by ship, look for quicksand."
"Thank you." "Can we become strong like you?" Vivi...
"He's trying to find it. Compared to that... what am I doing? Sulking."
"Thought I could change by becoming Queen. But nothing changed. Ignorant and useless."
"Ara, Dagger. You heard? That crybaby grew up."
"D-Dagger. Are you worrying about what he said?"
"Vivi is Vivi, Dagger is Dagger. Nothing to worry about."
"What's wrong?" "Okay then." Ectozol? Bed is no good.
Kuja's hideout. Okay? Glad Eiko is here. Seriously.
Phoenix Pinion. Ability Up. Learn early. Mog's... MP 20% up? Ability Up first.
MP, Consumption, Ability. Counter! East. White guy. Found him. Going now.
Only speaks to same race? Quicksand. Nyan. Fighting. East is right.
Quicksand. Right from here. Chain Counter. Selling friends... but Kuja is unforgivable.
Petan is enough. East. Go by ship. Somewhere here. What are those 3 things?
Did I eat this? Beazle insect? Like trolls? Weaken it. No Libra is tough.
Eat. Painful. Secretion? Limit Roll? Limit Glove? Didn't eat Troll?
Didn't eat Troll? Should have bought items. Non-elemental damage.
Food education continues. Wanna see. Here. Fight? Small fry.
Sandstorm hurts. Limit Glove... Quina. Pumpkin Head is good when HP low.
Pumpkin Head might work. Blindness? Counter Smart. Heal. 257.
Not now. Bad. This team... Where? Full firepower party. Meat Glove died. Misses a lot.
Painful, need heal. Remove? Want to raise level. Accuracy... Freya needed?
Equipment. Accuracy? Mental Break. Take Freya's equip. Accuracy. Lapis... take a bit. Remove Diamond Gauntlets.
Steiner. Ability Up. Yoichi's Heart. Insect Killer good. Blindness evasion. Can still go.
Ability Up OK. Eiko doesn't attack. Freya goodbye. Two healers? Why do I care so much about Quina?
No blindness? Strong one. Level Up? Healing spell? White Wind?
1000 Needles good. Mighty Guard MP cost is high. Shell/Protect.
64 MP gone. Insect and blindness. Won't lose one bug. Sorry seriously. Playing around before. Seven? Close.
Can't say anything. Won't lose. Come on. Front row? Want to cure him.
Weaken more? Poison? Coming from body, thought it was poison.
Steiner Mental Break OK. Charge! What's differnet? Wind? Far back is correct?
Nothing interesting. I'll do it. Beat him up. Annoyed. What's Charge?
Wait, bad. Everyone attack? All free turn? Uses one turn?
Potion. One turn? Careful? Not gentle? Potion back. Not here, got it.
Sandstorm? Painful? Dying? Battery low. Charging. Graviga annoying.
How much? Sandstorm again. Graviga lowers HP to zero if low? Ability. Eat him.
Fight. Quina eat. Confused? What to do? Hit and die?
Turn later. Learn? Have you made this? Everyone dying. Why is this happening?
Use Tent. Enemy base. Save. Okay? No problem. Leave it. Motivated?
Motivated. Can do it? Accuracy. Steiner working? Equipped. Let's go.
Stop. Rolled on palm. Called? Fast. Trap. W-Where is this?
Trap from start? "Umu. I don't know-kero. Came to the place Black Mages said... jumped into quicksand... blackout."
Wait, isn't it only the magic users left here?
"Zidane is obeying me right now to save your lives."
"But you see, I hate keeping promises to people."
"And I just love tormenting people slowly."
"So I want to give you all a wonderful present of death."
This guy is full of it.
"The floor of that room is rigged to open up."
"Isn't it a brilliant idea?" Die, you jerk!
"You can save yourselves just by turning the hourglass upside down."
"Hopefully Zidane returns to save you before then."
"You have about 10 minutes of life left."
"Well, pray that your savior appears by then."
Alright! If I don't do it, who will, kero?!
We came out because we were told to...
But don't you think it's okay?
Just light them all and it's fine.
If we can do that, this way...
It must be the key, kero.
If the key's in there, isn't it fine?
I just had to take the key?!
But I can't find the weights to put on it, kero.
I need to put necessary weights on this.
What do you want to do?
Which one goes on which side?
Can I put this on the left?
Can't I just put all the heavy ones on?
I couldn't see them, so I thought no one was there.
But there's no time to celebrate, kero.
So he was with one of them?
According to the Black Mages earlier...
There's supposed to be a trap ahead, kero.
Basically, if we light them all...
Anyway, escaping is our priority, kero.
We can't just keep relying on Zidane.
Before Zidane and the others get back...
Eiko and the rest of us...
If we all work together, we can do it!
He said to light them all, right?
I saw a glimpse of it.
I feel like I bought stuff for them.
After the physical party, it's the magic party, huh?
To those who watched the livestream...
We made a lot of progress again.
The physical party is nice and all...
We run out of Potions so fast.
See you tomorrow starting from noon.
An original song is coming out!
